ParaDef.Info: The ingress or egress QoS Policy ID for which to display matching SAPs. Values-1 to 65535.
The ingress or egress Filter Policy ID for which to display matching SAPs. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies the physical port identifier portion of the SAP definition. Values-The following values apply to the 7750 SR and 7950 XRS:.
Specifies matching SAPs with the specified IP interface.
The IP address of the interface for which to display matching SAPs. Values-1.0.0.0 to 223.255.255.255.
The IP interface name for which to display matching SAPs.
Profile ID that identifies a specific profile to display.
